TEXT.S: Gipun hya' ga cyux maki' tay 36 00 N, 138 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 377,915 sq km (maki' tay 62ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 364,485 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 13,430 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 126,702,133. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 12.50 , lhlahuy hya' ga 68.50 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 19 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Tokyo. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 23 na tay mawpuw sazing byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Akihito, aring ryax 7 squ byacing tay 1 sa kawas 1989 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
